long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy uninterrupted Surfline streams with this extension, specially designed for premium account users. No more manual clicks on the "Are you still watching?" popup!

Usage:
Simply click the extension icon to toggle the continuous streaming feature on or off.

Additional Information:
With the extension turned on, your video will automatically play in fullscreen mode within your browser window.

For a complete fullscreen experience spanning your entire monitor, first activate the extension and then switch your browser to fullscreen mode using the F11 key.

Tip: Pin this extension to your toolbar for quick access and a seamless surfing experience!
